content.html: cryptobros: everything is a smart contract and so it’s totally good and fair also crypto bros: awwwww I got scammed bc the smart contract had malicious code that i didn’t spot 😭😭😭 there’s a reason real financial systems have so much regulation and insurance 🙃🙃🙃
content.value:
cryptobros: everything is a smart contract and so it’s totally good and fair

also crypto bros: awwwww I got scammed bc the smart contract had malicious code that i didn’t spot 😭😭😭

there’s a reason real financial systems have so much regulation and insurance 🙃🙃🙃
